articles.author: Sameer Suri
articles.title: The Weeknd teams up with MADONNA for raunchy single from The Idol - Daily Mail
articles.description: Its new song, entitled Popular, includes scathing lyrics about a woman so obsessed with fame she will 'sell her soul' and 'kill anyone' to attain it. 'I've seen the devil down Sunset,' Madonna says.
articles.content:
The Weeknd has teamed up with Playboi Carti and Madonna on a raunchy new single for his upcoming miniseries The Idol.
With a cast led by The Weeknd and Lily-Rose Depp, the show follows a pop star wh… [+5010 chars]

articles.title: English TikToker who's set up home in America reveals 'the things that make no sense to a Brit' - Daily Mail
articles.description: TikToker Melissa Herrera is originally from King's Lynn, Norfolk, but moved to South Carolina in 2021. 'I'm biased, but I think the Brits do everything better on the whole,' she says.
articles.content:
Melissa Herrera is originally from Norfolk but moved to South Carolina in August 2021
Moving from the UK to America can be a culture shock and one British TikToker in the U.S is brilliantly capturin… [+7023 chars]
